newsitem.title: USA: National Record Q4 same-store sales fall.
newsitem.headline: National Record Q4 same-store sales fall.

text.p: NOTE: Figures in millions except percentage.

Full-year fiscal 1997 sales results reflect one week less in fiscal 1997 compared to prior year and the closing of 12 stores. Comparing the same fifty-two weeks in each fiscal year results in a total sales increase of 1.98% and a comparable store increase of 1.19%.

Q4 results also reflect one less week in 1997 vs fourth quarter 1996. When adjusted to reflect the same thirteen weeks in each fiscal fourth quarter, total sales declined 6.11% and comparable store sales decreased 5.77% in 1997, versus 1996.
Month is four weeks ended April 26.
Full company name is National Record Mart Inc.
